DOC.brief_title: Studying Biomarkers Tissue Samples From Young Patients With Acute Myeloid Leukemia Previously Enrolled Clinical Trial POG-9421
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To profile basal potentiate phospho-protein network ( PPPNs ) use tissue sample pediatric patient de novo acute myeloid leukemia ( AML ) previously enrol clinical trial POG-9421 . - To classify AML-based signal transduction mechanism . - To correlate profile basal PPPNs specific molecular lesion ( e.g. , FLT3-ITD , NPM , WT1 , c-kit , CEPBα , PASGΔ75 , karyotype ) profile gene expression tumor tissue sample . OUTLINE : Banked tissue sample collect laboratory study , include phospho-protein signal gene expression profile study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis acute myeloid leukemia , meet 1 follow criterion : Primary induction failure ( i.e. , fail achieve remission within first 60 day therapy ) Relapsed disease ( early late ) In continuous complete remission Previously enrol POG9421 Tissue sample available PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
